llmRateLimitReached: Whoops! High demand is causing our service to be temporarily unresponsive. Please be patient and retry in a moment. If the problem persists, please contact {{supportEmail}}.
llmServiceOverloaded: Whoops! High demand is causing our service to be temporarily unresponsive. Please be patient and retry in a moment. If the problem persists, please contact {{supportEmail}}.
userUsageLimitReached: Uh-oh! You've reached the monthly API limit. Please reach out to the admin team for assistance, at {{supportEmail}}.
modelUsageLimitReached: It seems like the current selected LLM model quota has been reached. Please try using another model or contact our support team for assistance, at {{supportEmail}}.
errorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again in a few moments. If the problem persists, please contact {{supportEmail}}.
